Downing severity since I can open the CVS perspective which contains the view 
but this is still pretty serious.

It turns out that I was fooled by the new look. The CVS Repositories view was 
already open byt the tab was hidden.
This is probably a consequence of the 'show all' refactoring I've been doing.
Indeed it was.  Fix submitted into HEAD.
